Portal 2 is a fantastic game with a great storyline and brilliant gameplay. The characters are wonderful, I love everything about it. One of my favourite games! 10/10.

Este juego (y la saga en realidad) me parece fascinante. Además de alargar bastante más la duración esta segunda parte introduce nuevas mecánicas como las generadas a partir de la segunda mitad del juego por los geles. Igualmente el espíritu del primero sigue intacto, más bien se agranda si cabe aún más.

Los puzzles, pese a no ser de una complejidad muy elevada en su mayoría, son todos una aplicación de los principios y mecánicas que nos ofrece el juego basados en los portales, la clave para que sean tan fluidos es que no son del tipo "ensayo y error", para pasarlos únicamente tendremos que pensar como aplicar todo lo que hemos aprendido sobre el uso de las herramientas que se ponen a nuestra disposición, pero en ningún caso nos veremos repitiendo las cosas una y otra vez hasta aburrirnos y podamos dar con la solución.

Pero los puzzles son solo un fragmento de ese "todo" que convierte a esta saga -bajo mi punto de vista- en una de las mejores de la historia. Personajes carismáticos, desarrollo dinámico y variado -cosa muy meritoria dado el género-, una historia muy trabajada, humor, unos valores de producción cuidados al detalle... y todo esto en un tipo de juego tan poco convencional que lo convierten en una experiencia tan auténtica como única.

No tengo ningún pero, ninguno para esta obra maestra. No es algo que deban jugar los amantes de los juegos de puzzles, es algo que debería de probar todo el mundo que le gusten los videojuegos porqué seguramente no encontraran nada parecido a esta maravilla nunca.
hikayesi gerçekten çok sürükleyici ve zamanın nasıl geçtiğini anlamayarak oynadığım nadir oyunlardan. eğer bulmaca gibi şeylere merakınız varsa tavsiye ederim kesinlikle.

This ultimate masterpiece game is filled with puzzles, sacarsm and emotions. 

As you get betrayed by your "best buddy" you wonder through the depths of a Salt Mine bought out by a maniac who made shower curatains you learn more and more about this mystical place. 

Portal 2 is by far the best sequel to a perfect puzzle game with a story line full of action, joy, fun and happiness. If you like new challenges, or facing the most sassiest computer A.I in the universe (and the biggest mo ron in the universe), then this is the game for you.

I didn't know what to write about in my review, so here's a recipe for pancakes instead:

1 1/2 cups all-purpose flour
3 1/2 teaspoons baking powder
1 teaspoon salt
1 tablespoon white sugar
1 1/4 cups milk
1 egg
3 tablespoons butter, melted

1. In a large bowl, sift together the flour, baking powder, salt and sugar. Make a well in the center and pour in the milk, egg and melted butter; mix until smooth.

2. Heat a lightly oiled griddle or frying pan over medium high heat. Pour or scoop the batter onto the griddle, using approximately 1/4 cup for each pancake. Brown on both sides and serve hot.

Eines der besten Spiele dieses Jahrzehnts, wenn nicht sogar Jahrhunderts!
Das Gameplay des Vorgängers wird beibehalten, aber mit so viel Raffinesse und Witz in ein Konglomerat an epischen Szenen gesteckt, dass man einfach immer bestens unterhalten wird, solange man die Rätsel löst. ;) Bei manchen Rätseln braucht man dann doch auch etwas länger, aber wenn man es dann hinter sich gebracht hat, fühlt man sich umso toller.
Die Vertonung ist 1A und die originellen neuen Ideen sorgen dafür, dass keine Langeweile aufkommt.
Nicht zu vergessen sorgt auch das sehr gelungene Ende, das einen Wow-Effekt beim Spieler auslöst, für eine gelungene Abrundung des Ganzen.
Eine uneingeschränkte Kaufempfehlung! Glaubt mir, Das Geld ist gut investiert.

What hasn't been said about Portal 2 already? It's a great game and I have no faults with it. 
The characters are all amazing and even Chell, P-body and Atlas are fully developed characters even without any dialogue of their own. GLADOS reprises her role as the main villain and with the Wheatly hilarity ensues. There is not a line in this game that could not be said in the real world without someone remembering the line and laughing at it. 

The story is short enough to not outstay its welcome, yet long enough to provide a great experience and with co-op mode and challenges, the game has plenty to do and keep even the most portal savvy players still playing. This isn't even mentioning all the maps the community members have made, of which there are tons and they are all great (all the good ones anyway). 


If you don't have the game, get it now or when it goes on sale. If you already have it, why are you reading this and not grabbing a friend and playing it now?
Amazing storyline, design, characters which actually draw you in, and amazing game mechanics. Soo many easter eggs and things to discover and THE LORE is so interesting just get it!!

Amazing game, one of the best I have ever played. It is rich with lore, comedy, and also that nice hint of creepy stuff Valve loves to throw into their games. The puzzles are truly quite enjoyable, but being a complete genius like myself, I solved each test almost instantly! *ambitious laughter* But anyways, the characters are amazingly done, the entire story that the game tells you along with the one you uncover on your own has truly left me satisfied. This game is indeed a masterpiece and I would recommend this to any and everybody who has not played this magnificent work of art! It's bloody brilliant!

To me, this is the best game i've ever played. Here's why:

-If you've played the first Portal, this game will be amazing. It's still amazing either way, but there are some easter eggs from the first one that will only add onto your emotional distress. Which, admit it, most of you love a good story, and letting connections click. I highly recommend playing Portal before Portal 2.

-There is much more of a story in this one. Even after a year and a half, I still think of it all the time.

-Before you know it, you're emotionally attached to all of the characters.
The puzzles will leave you extremely frustrated, but it's an exilarating feeling to finally complete a test you've been working on for an hour.

I've played this game 8 times through. I love the characters, the plot, and everything about it. If you haven't gotten this game, I highly recommend getting it right now. You definetly wont regret it!

Le scénario, la bande-son, les graphismes, les doublages... Tout y est. En plus d'être innovant, ce jeu est un chef-d'oeuvre et est fortement recommandé à tout joueur de bon goût.

Un petit défaut cependant (puisque rien n'est parfait), la durée de vie du mode Solo est bien trop courte. Heureusement, le coop permet de rajouter quelques heures de jeu, et le Workshop rajoute encore plus de possibilités.

싱글플레이도 훌륭하지만, 멀티플레이도 좋다. 플레이어 두명이서 각각 로봇을 조종하는데 서로의 포탈을 이용하는 법을 생각하고, 고민하는 부분에서 싱글플레이와는 다른 방법을 생각할 수 있는게 좋다. 또한 둘이서 협력해서 멀티플레이를 깨면 더욱 재미있다고 할까. 
멀티플레이 입실 할 때에 각각의 파트로 가는 방법을 연구하는 것도 꽤나 재미있는 요소다. 우리가 게임 내에서 포탈을 사용하는 방법을 응용해서 추락하는 힘을 이용해 멀리 날아간다던가 하는 방법으로 새로운 파트를 찾아내고, 플레이하는 재미가 있다.

I've tried to review this game for quite sometime now... it's really diffiicult.. The game is good... Great actually. The storyline is impressive... like really impressive.. Valve did an excellent job at making this game emotional, fun and a full experience for gaming. It's different and unique while adding it's taste of gameplay by using portals.. Do you know any other successful game using portals?? No.... Of course not.... Just this game. This game know's when to be emotional... when to be funny....when to be confusing... when to be enjoyable... It stays at a solid pace and the puzzles are just difficult enough to keep you going. Puzzle games can be a dreading experience.. expecially when they are long and BORING.. But this game's puzzles are satisfying.. I actually felt more intelligent everytime I surpassed the following puzzles.. I FELT LIKE I COULD GO TO OXFORD... Now not only is this game replayable... but the characters are solid. There are only 3 legit characters in this game and they are portrayed beautifully! Of course Chell doesn't speak...or have any emotions but...... WHO CARES... The other characters are so good that you completely forget about your character as a whole! This game had me on my toes.. I was deeply impressed by the use of portals and what I could do with them... The Co-op is enjoyable... but don't play it with a random person... It isn't as fun when you see them fail... anyway please buy this game.. It is....FANTASTICO... 9.8/10
